Public Member Functions | Properties

Aurora.ScriptEngine.AuroraDotNetEngine.IScriptPlugin Interface Reference

These plugins provide for the ability to hook up onto scripts for events and are called each iteration by the script engine event thread. More...

Inheritance diagram for Aurora.ScriptEngine.AuroraDotNetEngine.IScriptPlugin:

List of all members.

 Add the given region to the plugin that it will be serving.

 Check the module and all scripts that it may be being used by This is called every iteration by the event thread.

Properties

string Name [get]
 Returns the plugin name.
bool RemoveOnStateChange [get]
 Whether or not the plugin should remove itself from scripts on state changes.

Detailed Description

These plugins provide for the ability to hook up onto scripts for events and are called each iteration by the script engine event thread.
